channel.description: Loops - Keys dict_3 = { "cat": "mammal", "lizard": "reptile", "goldfish": "fish", "chickadee": "bird" } for key in dict_3: print(f"{key}: {dict_3[key]}") Loops - Keys & Values dict_3 = { "cat": "mammal", "lizard": "reptile", "goldfish": "fish", "chickadee": "bird" } for key, value in dict_3.items(): print(f"{key}: {value}")
